title: Got a sore head
body:
Players theses days im pretty bad at the game, played to games tonight first game we were winning then top keeps pushing lanes on his/her own
and end up going 0 5 0 ask why oh lagging bad internet.  Why play draft with bad internet in end lose cause 4 vs 5 in team fights as they die pushing on there own.

second game my support as morg puts 2 points into w keeps putting w on mobs stuffing up my cs and last hitting then 3 point into e only e herself 
4 point q at that time i ask wheres the q cause there adc ashe plus yummi were tower diving us she trys to q ashe when theres mosters in front of ashe. we lose tower. so i try going out farming cs jungler givens me crap bout cs. 
so i saw its hard to last hit when support keeps droping a max w on waves on mosters. yes my support morg max w first cause shes no good with q faceplam.

jungler types back hard to when a game when adc is int feeding when i wasnt at all. 

games have gotten far worse since school holidays started in new Zealand. school starts monday. but guess what draft doesnt come online to 2pm new zealand time so i might get one good game before new zealand school kids get home.

i have seen alot bs in draft and rank. when players go 0 3 0 in line then quit lefting 4 vs 5 at 13mins 
then theres trolls and feeders.
supports who sit in lane only laugh spaming laugh yes this happen in rank. they where a duo someone put up a ff and they voted no we losing hard this is worse kind forceing 3 players to keep playing were duo having fun trolling and feeding in rank then calling you bad cause your tilted by there crap. my jungler rage quit in the end. still couldnt ff they drag bout another 20mins same players twice in to weeks i report the first time and second time i got 10 game ban chat and lost level 4 honor cause that duo. you knw i loved league that i spent around 1900 nzd dollars in last 9 years yes been playing since jan 2011
you think i could get some nice good games without all this shit!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

yes i am Dyslexia yes i google learning problems to get the word. dont bitch about my typos txts talk im not using my phone so no auto correct.
